name: Web Form Post Data File
summary: Learn about .ATT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ATT files are commonly received via email when the form encoding type is incorrect. For example, the encoding type (enctype) may be "text" instead of "text/plain."

description:
An ATT file is an intermediate file generated by Web forms when a user submits data using the form in a web browser. When the data is submitted using the web form, the data is stored in the ATT file and is also emailed to the designated user. The ATT files are received as an attachment to the emails in cases where the encoding type is incorrect.

Applications that can open ATT files include text editors such as Microsoft Notepad, Notepad++, and Atom.

File created by Web forms when users submit data in a Web browser; contains contents from a Web form that have been emailed to the designated recipient; attached to email messages with the filename postdata.att.
